name: src/SchemaClass-test.js
src/SchemaClass.js
SchemaClass
description:
Where all things good come from! This Class uses JSON Schema Draft 4 to build
   basic models for the rest of the application. Please See json-schema.org
   and also ajv validator for the basics.

name: Schema
description:
A valid JSON Schema for this class. You can find examples
at http://json-schema.org/examples.html. There is also a
generator for JSON data. http://jsonschema.net/#/

name: constructor
description: Accepts a JSON Schema pattern for Model Building

name: merge
description: A Merge utility for JavaScript Objects

name: validate
description: Validate data against the current schema

name: src/SchemaClass-test.js
it1
description: is able create a basic validator class

name: it3
description: is able to create new instances with defaults

name: it4
description: is able to validate the model data

name: describe5
description:
Private methods for the SchemaClass are used to set and get
   the current schema for the class. Future plans are to expand
   this to include the caching features of ajv

name: it6
description: is able to throw a schema error using _schemaError

name: it7
description: is able to get and set the schema

name: it8
description: is able to get and set a validator
